channel.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
channel.description:
[Main Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/master-rework-of-doom/47102)
Social Reworks:
> **[color=blue]Psychic (Unique Blue Dragon Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Astral Network: You may speak to anyone you have linked with anonymously at night. They can also talk to each other. Anyone in jail cannot hear or speak using the chat. This passive will remain if your class changes. > > Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses. 1 day cool down.
> **[color=purple]Illusionist (Unique Unseen Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Astral Network: You may speak to anyone you have linked with anonymously at night. They can also talk to each other. Anyone in jail cannot hear or speak using the chat. This passive will remain if your class changes. > > Passive: Skilled: You can use both night abilities in the same night. > > Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Alter Link: Target player is immediately added to the astral network. If they are already in the astral network they are immediately removed. The network cannot have more than 4 other players at once. Unlimited uses.. 1 day cool down. > > Night Ability: Mind warp - Target player receives incorrect feedback tonight . Unlimited uses.
> **[color=blue]Priest (Unique Blue Dragon Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Call of the Dead: Speak to the dead at night. > > Passive: Devout: You cannot die until someone else dies. > > Night Ability 1: Channel: Use the primary power of someone who has died. You may only use each person once, and you may not utilize a Killer or Special class. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Awaken: Turn all dead Blue Dragon into awakened souls. 1 use.
> **[color=purple]Soulcatcher (Unique Unseen Social)[/color]** :shield: > > Passive: Call the Darkness: Dead Unseen may speak to the Unseen while this is alive. > > Night Ability 1: Channel: Use the primary power of someone who has died. You may only use each person once, and you may not utilize a Killer or Special class. Unlimited uses.
> **[color=Blue]Scribe (Blue Dragon Social)[/color]** > > Passive: Espionage - If a hidden negative effect is applied to you then you will know. > > Passive: Trained: You may use both of your day abilities any number of times per day. > > Day Ability: Private matters - Whispers to and from you are hidden while Private Matter is active. Unlimited uses, toggle able. > > Day Ability: Royal Documents: You will hear the next four whispers to and from the King. 2 uses. > > Night Ability 1: Eavesdrop - Hear whispers to and from Target player until you choose another player. Does not count as a visit. Unlimited uses.
> **[color=purple]Forger (Unseen Social)[/color]** > > Passive: Espionage - If a hidden negative effect is applied to you then you will know. > > Passive: Trained: You may use both of your day abilities any number of times per day. > > Day Ability: Private matters - Whispers to and from you are hidden while Private Matter is active. Unlimited uses, toggle able. > > Day Ability: Royal Documents: You will hear the next four whispers to and from the King. 2 uses. > > Night Ability 1: Eavesdrop - Hear whispers to and from Target player until you choose another player. Does not count as a visit. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Forge: Look at a player's logs. If they die, they will be wiped from the graveyard. 2 uses.
> **[color=blue]Noble (Blue Dragon Social)[/color]** > > Passive: Bureaucracy: You can see vote contents in real time exept when you are on trial > > Passive 1: Royal Blood: You can step up to be king > > Day Ability 1: Political Pressure: Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. (2 uses) > > Day Ability 2: Noble Twin: If there is a tie on trial the person is executed. (2 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Bounty - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional trial and execution. Cannot target King. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Overtime - There can be up to 3 trials tomorrow. 1 use.
> **[color=purple]Aristocrat (Unseen Social)[/color]** > > Passive: Bureaucracy - You can see vote contents in real time exept when you are on trial. > > Passive 1: Royal Blood - You can step up to be king > > Day Ability 1: Political Pressure - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. 2 uses. > > Day Ability 2: Noble Twin- If there is a tie on trial the person is executed. 2 uses. > > Night Ability 1: Bounty - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional trial and execution. Cannot target King. Unlimited uses. > > Night Ability 2: Cease and desist - There can be only 1 trial tomorrow. 1 use.
> **[color=red]Apostle (Cult Social)[/color]** > > Passive: Call the Darkness: The Cult may speak to their dead while you live. > > Day Ability: Mind Control - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. 2 uses. > > Day Ability: Telepathy: Telepathy: Send an anonymous message to everyone. 2 uses. > > Night Ability: Read Mind: See all whispers to and from your target the next day. 3 uses. > > Night Ability 2: Hypnotize - Target player will receive incorrect feedback. 2 uses.
> [color=blue]**Awakened Soul (Blue Dragon Special)**[/color] > > Passive: Undead: You appear dead to all other players, and cannot talk to living players or vote. You will not appear in the court during the day. > > Night Ability: Death's Judgement: Vote to kill a player. If a majority of Awakened Souls vote to kill them as well, they will die, bypassing all forms of immunity. If there is a tie or no majority is reached, nothing will happen. All Awakened Souls will revert to their original class.

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Then what happens when people want you to prove by hearing whispers to king?

Also we could just have the ability be instant like with link minds.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
It’s still weak though. It’s not uncommon for people to send useless information in whispers. Either buff it so it’s for the rest of the day or replace it with a “prepare forge” ability.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The class it effects is king who is also immediately claimed to by basically everyone. Your argument is invalid.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Royal documents should be replaced then. It only affects one class and is weak.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Add a day ability that allows you to prepare a forge then.

He already has 2 day Ability’s though.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NightX:

Day Ability: Royal Documents: You will hear the next four whispers to and from the King. 2 uses.

Change this to “You will hear all whispers to and from the king for the rest of the day.” It’s not uncommon for people to whisper useless information.

NightX:

You mostly have to guess what people are, meaning it’s hard to make fake logs without contradicting their class.

Not if you are able to edit it instead of just completely rewriting it.

NightX:

Forger doesn’t have that time though.

Add a day ability that allows you to prepare a forge then.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Here’s another option:

Wisdom of the dead(1-use) - the dead may talk to the living for the rest of the day. Can be used when dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I guess, but I would much rather have one of those more social abilities than Channel, which just feels like something someone can do so that they’re not only listening to the dead talking at night

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I think Call of the Dead is social enough. Awaken, while not directly social, has plenty of debate for the dead.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
points to Awaken

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Well I still feel we should find a suitable social day ability for the Priest

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Tbh I feel the Priest is good as is.

We don’t want to make it OP

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I meant when the Priest was dead, not when alive.

It’s just too many votes, and a way for Priest to confirm

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Alright then I’ll make a poll.

Which ability is better (as in balanced) as a Day Ability for the Priest?

Seance: (D) (1)
Allow the dead Blue Dragon players to accuse and vote today. (More Dead Interaction)

Imbue: (D) (1)
Gain an accusal and vote for every dead Blue Dragon player today. (Direct benefit from Dead)

  • Seance
  • Imbue
  • Neither

0 voters

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
That basically means the Dead decide who is lynched.

A more mild version might be to let just the Priest cast the vote. It’s pretty strong as the living know the Priest is good.

I’d consider it, but I’d want to hear more feedback first.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
And would this be broken on the Priest:

Seance: (D) (1)
Allow all dead Blue Dragon players to accuse and vote for the next trial.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Let’s just keep Priest and Apostle as Social xD

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
You could also just make it a Special class. And than make special convert into Apostle. Maybe that’s weird though.

Or we could make Ritualist have Dark whispers.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I don’t know, because then it wouldn’t make sense for the Apostles to have Dark Whispers, just is thematically and more organized as a Social class

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
It could be Support. Nothing wrong with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Both Channel and Awaken seem like Supports

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
I know, but what I’m also trying to do is give the Priest an actual Social ability

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Still has the same problem as the original I think.

Besides, it would be more interesting to give the dead other ways to interact instead of just one method.

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: Livicus
item.description:
Okay would this be a better Seance? I’m just trying to strengthen the Social part of Priest

Seance: (D) (1)
Choose a player when dead. Tonight, only you will freely talk with them.

This is heavily nerfed from the first suggestion

Read full topic

item.title: Social Reworks and Awakened Soul
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Yeah I’m slow

Just be like Night and keep poking me tbh

Read full topic
